segments.text: May I speak to Mr . Smith ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He is at the warehouse this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time do you expect him back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I have no idea . You can call him there if you like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I have the number . Bye !
segments.speaker: S1
